english.segment1: I shut all my windows. They protect me from the storm. Im alone but I wait for someone. One who keeps the lights on. One who keeps the house warm
english.segment2: I feel a swaying rhythm. If we get swept to sea Ill be happy. Its all we wish for now. I wish youd keep the lights down. I wish youd keep the house warm
english.segment3: We have enough we can handle it. If we dont make I will fall apart. All is in vain for us.
english.segment4: I think we can make it now. I think that we can make it. I wish youd keep the lights down. I wish youd keep the house warm
